name: someones_birthday
description:
(please this is only for my friend charlie please do not look at this if you are NOT charlie)

** CONTROLS **

Movement

W - up

A - left

S - down

D - right

E - interact

Space - progress dialogue/room

** CREDITS **

Anj (@anjkatsu on twitter) - game programming, sprites, tilesets; illustrations: self-portrait

Sara (@PrincessHonidew on twitter) - game idea; illustrations: self-portrait, portrait of warren, party horn, party popper, party hat, card from warren, end group illustration, mirror illustration of charlie with all items; wrote own dialogue.
